Station Short Name.desc: The station short name can be a alphanumeric station identifier, or a shorthand description of the station.  There is no corresponding location for the station short name in the GC response

Station Location.desc: Bounds for a network of stations, the point location of single stations, or a list of locations for trajectories

Network Station Locations*.desc: Bounds for a network of stations, the point location of single stations, or a list of locations for trajectories

Station WMO ID.desc: The World Meteorological Organization (WMO) assigns a 5-character alpha-numeric station identifier to ocean platforms reporting on the Global Telecommunication System (GTS). WMO numbers are allocated depending upon deployment area, and platform type (i.e. drifting buoys, moored buoys, ocean reference sites, and profiling floats).  The WMO ID is an optional identifier that identifies the 5-character WMO ID or the NDBC/C-MAN ID, which is often the WMO ID or another 5-character deliniation.  http://www.ndbc.noaa.gov/staid.shtml

Platform Sponsor Name.desc: A person, group, or organization’s full or partial support of an IOOS activity, asset, model, or product.

Platform Sponsor.desc: A person, group, or organization’s full or partial support of an IOOS activity, asset, model, or product.

Operator Name.desc: The contact information of the platform operator(s). May be the platform owner as well, but an owner role is not currently specified. Contact information about providers of particular datasets from the platform should NOT go here

Network Station Times*.desc: Bounds for a network of stations, the point location of single stations, or a list of locations for trajectories

Platform Type.desc: A term describing the type of platform that houses the sensors (e.g. buoy, shore station, etc)

Platform Type Name.desc: A term describing the type of platform that houses the sensors (e.g. buoy, shore station, etc)

Station Publisher Name.desc: The name of the publisher of the data from a particular platform via the data services using this term.  This may be the same as the operator, but does not necessarily have to be.  This also may be the same as the service provider in the GC response, but does not necessarily have to be

Station ID.desc: The urn which contains the station ID and the authority.  The GC Station ID and the DS Station ID urns should be identical. If the Station System Name urn is included, it should also be identical to the DS Station ID and thus the GC Station ID. The authority is located within the namespace.

Operator Email.desc: The contact information of the platform operator(s). May be the platform owner as well, but an owner role is not currently specified. Contact information about providers of particular datasets from the platform should NOT go here

Operator Country.desc: The contact information of the platform operator(s). May be the platform owner as well, but an owner role is not currently specified. Contact information about providers of particular datasets from the platform should NOT go here

Station Long Name.desc: The station long name is a longer description of the station.  There is no corresponding location for the station long name in the GC response, although it may be similar to the station description in the GC response

Station Publisher Email.desc: The contact information of the publisher of the data from a particular platform.   This may be the same as the operator, but does not necessarily have to be.  This also may be the same as the service provider in the GC response, but does not necessarily have to be

Station Publisher country.desc: The contact information of the publisher of the data from a particular platform.   This may be the same as the operator, but does not necessarily have to be.  This also may be the same as the service provider in the GC response, but does not necessarily have to be

Operator Sector Name.desc: Societal sector that best describes the platform operator

Operator Sector.desc: Societal sector that best describes the platform operator

Network ID.desc: SensorML document for a network of stations provides valid networkID identifier, and the networkID:

Short Name.desc: SensorML document for a network of stations provides valid Short Name identifier, and the Short Name:

Long Name.desc: SensorML document for a network of stations provides valid Long Name identifier, and the Long Name:

Parent Network.desc: SensorML document for a network of stations provides valid Parent Network Classifier, and the Parent Networ:

Components*.desc: Bounds for a network of stations, the point location of single stations, or a list of locations for trajectories

Components Output*.desc: Bounds for a network of stations, the point location of single stations, or a list of locations for trajectories

Components Quantity*.desc: Bounds for a network of stations, the point location of single stations, or a list of locations for trajectories
